Hong Song Nam greets Malian prime minister
articles.content:
Hong Song Nam greets Malian prime minister 
    Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Ahmed mohamed Ag Hamani on his appointment as prime minister of the Republic of Mali.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop in the future, the message sincerely wished him success in his work.

articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) - General Secretary  Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Union of Young Communists of Cuba.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Julio Martinez Ramirez, second secretary of the national committee of the Union of Young Communists of Cuba, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Greetings to Mozambican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mozambican President
    Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Mozambican President Joaquim Alberto Chissano on June 19 on the occasion of the 27th anniversary of the Republic of Mozambique.
 Expressing belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, the message sincerely wished the president and people of Mozambique greater success in their work for the stability and development of the country.
